high_descs: Turn to your right, then left move forward the face the side of the bed on your left
Pick up the book on the bed
Turn to your left then walk straight, then right on the end of the bed then head to the lamp on the left side of the bed
anns.task_desc: Examine the book by the light

high_descs: Move to the right side of the bed ahead of you
Pick up a book from the bed
Move to the left side of the bed to the end table
anns.task_desc: Inspect the book on the bed with a lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the right side of the bed.
Walk to the table on the far side of the bed
anns.task_desc: Examine the book by lamp light.
